Source.Name: mpc-qt
Source.Summary: A clone of Media Player Classic reimplemented in Qt.
Source.Description: Media Player Classic Home Cinema (mpc-hc) is considered by many to be the quintessential media player for the Windows desktop. Media Player Classic Qute Theater (mpc-qt) aims to reproduce most of the interface and functionality of mpc-hc while using libmpv to play video instead of DirectShow.
